general.description: Overview Toyota's Core IC Cushion Forklift is one of the most popular forklifts in North America. Warehousing and distribution applications, the auto industry, general manufacturing plants and retail storefronts often utilize Toyota's Core IC Cushion for its extreme versatility. Powerful enough to lift up to 6,500 lbs yet capable of navigating in 12 foot aisles, the Core IC Cushion forklift is a trusted multipurpose forklift. Model numbers: 8FGCU15-32 | 8FGCSU20 REQUEST A BROCHURE Toyota Material Handling | Products: Core IC Forklifts

features: Engine hood assist damper with lock device

According to recent studies by Peerless Research Group, more and more forklift owners plan to keep their forklifts for 10+ years! Just like a car, truck or other motorized asset, periodic maintenance, service and upkeep is required, even under normal operating conditions, to keep your Toyota Core IC Cushion Forklift operating to peak performance. It is not uncommon for Toyota owners to use their forklift up to 10 years, as long as the forklift is properly maintained. Paired with a Planned Maintenance (PM) Plan, the Toyota Core IC Cushion Forklift can be an asset for your company for years to come.

Toyota's Core IC Cushion Forklift is one of the most popular forklifts in North America. Warehousing and distribution applications, the auto industry, general manufacturing plants and retail storefronts often utilize Toyota's Core IC Cushion for its extreme versatility. Powerful enough to lift up to 6,500 lbs yet capable of navigating in 12 foot aisles, the Core IC Cushion forklift is a trusted multipurpose forklift. Model numbers: 8FGCU15-32 | 8FGCSU20

The top selling Core IC Cushion Forklift is an industry-leading, multi-use forklift that comes with legendary Toyota reliability, starting with the world-renowned 4Y engine. Toyota's innovative System of Active Stability comes standard on all Core IC Cushion models to help protect both product and people.

Liquid propane gas (LPG) is a flammable and explosive gas. Changing a forklift LPG tank requires proper instruction. Click to learn eight tips for responsibly changing the LPG tank on your IC forklift.

Make the Most of Your Forklift with These Accessories
Vehicle management system that tracks impacts, utilization and maintenance schedules.
T-Matics Vehicle Management System
The system allows operators to easily and quickly capture Legal-for-Trade weight data en route, without extra steps.
Toyota Integrated Sideshifting Scale
Standard Cascade sideshifter is supplied with upper and lower bushings made of bronze.
Cascade Sideshifter w/Bronze Upper Bushing
Features a three-way adjustable armrest to enhance operator comfort and productivity.
Mini-Lever Controls with Ergoshift
Swings the bracket to 65 degrees down from the horizontal position.
LPG Swing Down Bracket
Steering wheel is equipped with an assist knob. Allows convenient operator maneuvering of forklift.
Steering Wheel Knob
Allows operators to quickly and easily change travel direction without removing hands from steering wheel or hydraulic controls.
EZ Pedal

general.description: Overview Toyota's Large IC Cushion forklift is a durable, high lift capacity forklift used primarily indoors and in specialty applications such as retail, lumber yards, heavy-duty manufacturing, shipping and freight, and various warehouse applications. The Large IC Cushion can be outfitted as the Box Car Special or the Paper Roll Special forklift models. Model numbers: 8FGC35-70U. Request a Brochure

features: 360 Degrees of Quality, Durability, Reliability & Value
Engine hood assist damper with lock device
Easy lift engine hood with wide 75 degree opening
Easy access to common service items such as filters & dipsticks
Dash integrated amenity tray and oversized cup holder

Toyota's Large IC Cushion forklift is a durable, high lift capacity forklift used primarily indoors and in specialty applications such as retail, lumber yards, heavy-duty manufacturing, shipping and freight, and various warehouse applications. The Large IC Cushion can be outfitted as the Box Car Special or the Paper Roll Special forklift models. Model numbers: 8FGC35-70U.

general.description: Overview The Toyota Box Car Special Forklift is an industry-leading solution for material handling within railcars. With a vertically higher counterweight, the Box Car Special is able to navigate in tight spaces while maintaining a high lift capacity. Also popular in specialty applications that require higher capacity lifts in tighter spaces, the Box Car Special is a specialty model forklift that opens new opportunities in racking, space planning and shipping. The Toyota Mid IC Pneumatic Forklift, with a capacity of 8,000 - 11,000 lbs, is a premier material handling solution for most mid-capacity outdoor applications. Powerful, durable and engineered with ergonomics in mind, the Mid IC Pneumatic Forklift is ideal for long days in the lumber yard, on construction sites and most other outdoor applications.

When moving heavy loads of building products all day long, it is crucial to have forklifts with the muscle to do the job right. That is why McCoy's Building Supply chose Toyota forklifts to move materials at over 80 stores, located in five southern states. Today, McCoy's Building Supply uses over 250 Toyota forklifts, which makes up 95% of their total fleet.

general.description: Overview The Toyota Core Electric Forklift is an ideal compact four-wheel electric lift truck solution for most indoor and warehouse applications. The Core Electric Forklift is capable of moving most any standard load while maintaining the ability to fully operate in spaces as small as 11 feet wide. And Toyota designed and built AC motors provide new levels of performance, efficiency, and reliability to maximize your productivity and return on investment. REQUEST A BROCHURE Toyota Material Handling | Products: Core Electric Forklifts

features: 360 Degrees of Quality, Durability, Reliability & Value

According to recent studies by Peerless Research Group, more and more forklift owners plan to keep their forklifts for 10+ years! Just like a car, truck or other motorized asset, periodic maintenance, service and upkeep is required, even under normal operating conditions, to keep your Toyota Core Electric Forklift operating to peak performance. It is not uncommon for Toyota owners to use their forklift up to 10 years, as long as the forklift is properly maintained. Paired with a Planned Maintenance (PM) Plan, the Core Electric Forklift can be an asset for your company for years to come.

The Toyota Core Electric Forklift is an ideal compact four-wheel electric lift truck solution for most indoor and warehouse applications. The Core Electric Forklift is capable of moving most any standard load while maintaining the ability to fully operate in spaces as small as 11 feet wide. And Toyota designed and built AC motors provide new levels of performance, efficiency, and reliability to maximize your productivity and return on investment.

Warehouse reconfiguration can help drive efficiency to match accelerating demand. Toyota supplies the equipment necessary to meet material handling challenges when racks get closer and aisles get more narrow. The Toyota Core Electric Turret Forklift features a Cascade mast and turret head, offering the ability to stack at 90-degree angles for increased productivity in even the most narrow aisles.

general.description: Overview Want to maintain an all electric fleet, but need a rugged, outdoor solution? Look no further than Toyota's Electric Pneumatic Forklift. Powerful and rugged enough to perform similar to internal combustion counterparts, but running off a battery, Toyota's Electric Pneumatic Forklift maintains clean air and low maintenance, but supports powerful, outdoor, traditionally IC applications. Request a Brochure Toyota Material Handling | Products: 80V Electric Pneumatic Forklift

features: 360 Degrees of Quality, Durability, Reliability & Value
Transistor controlled AC lift & drive Motors
AC drive motor (no brushes or commutator)
AC Hydraulic motor (no brushes or commutator)

According to recent studies by Peerless Research Group, more and more forklift owners plan to keep their forklifts for 10+ years! Just like a car, truck or another motorized asset, periodic maintenance, service and upkeep is required, even under normal operating conditions, to keep your Toyota Electric Pneumatic Forklift operating at peak performance. It is not uncommon for Toyota owners to use their forklift up to 10 years, as long as the forklift is properly maintained. Paired with a Planned Maintenance (PM) Plan, the Electric Pneumatic Forklift can be an asset for your company for years to come.

Want to maintain an all electric fleet, but need a rugged, outdoor solution? Look no further than Toyota's Electric Pneumatic Forklift. Powerful and rugged enough to perform similar to internal combustion counterparts, but running off a battery, Toyota's Electric Pneumatic Forklift maintains clean air and low maintenance, but supports powerful, outdoor, traditionally IC applications.

The Toyota Electric Pneumatic is a green, outdoor forklift solution. Instead of supplementing your indoor electric fleet with IC counterparts for your outdoor application, the Electric Pneumatic provides an all-electric option for both indoor and outdoor use.

What is a Walkie Stacker Forklift?

Walkie stacker forklifts are also known as straddle stackers which are great for lifting pallets in some of the largest warehouse applications. A walkie stacker forklift or walk-behind pallet truck is oftentimes used for transporting products over short distances and lifting pallets where a traditional forklift isn't necessary.

With many new, unique features coupled with the longstanding productivity, ergonomics and low cost of ownership you expect from Toyota Forklift, the Toyota Reach Truck line opens up new opportunities in warehouses and distribution centers. REQUEST A BROCHURE Toyota Material Handling | Products: 9-Series Reach Truck

features: AC-Powered Drive System with Torque Control
Battery Discharge Indicator w/ Lift Interrupt

According to recent studies by Peerless Research Group, more and more forklift owners plan to keep their forklifts for 10+ years! Just like a car, truck or other motorized asset, periodic maintenance, service and upkeep is required, even under normal operating conditions, to keep your Toyota Reach Truck operating to peak performance. It is not uncommon for Toyota owners to use their forklift up to 10 years, as long as the forklift is properly maintained. Paired with a Planned Maintenance (PM) Plan, the Toyota Reach Truck can be an asset for your company for years to come.
Integrated Clipboard, Amenities Tray & Cup Holder

Toyota's electric Reach Trucks deliver on efficiency, safety and performance like never before. With many new, unique features coupled with the longstanding productivity, ergonomics and low cost of ownership you expect from Toyota Forklift, the Toyota Reach Truck line opens up new opportunities in warehouses and distribution centers.

With world-class engineering and dependability, Toyota's new reach fork truck is the perfect solution for your warehouse. Toyota's Reach Truck comes in single and double reach models to help you utilize your warehouse space more efficiently. Choose between 24 volt or 36-volt power as well as battery compartments as short as 14.5 inches to as long as 21.5 inches. Longer maintenance intervals and over 500 engineering improvements make the Toyota Reach Truck the elite warehouse solution!
options: Product specifications may not reflect the most current product details. Authorized Toyota dealers retain the most current product specifications. All specifications should be verified by an authorized Toyota dealer prior to purchase.
* Based on 24" Load center ** Add load length and clearance
Make the Most of Your Forklift with These Accessories

Limits the travel speed if the reach mechanism is extended. Promotes the proper nesting of the carriage before traveling. Traveling with the reach extended can increase wear/damage to the truck and customer's load. The limited speed can be adjusted from 0-3.5 mph.
Reach Interlock Switch

Projects a laser line even with the fork tips. Allows the operator to quickly see if the forks are lined up with the pallet opening. Especially helpful on higher rack positions where distance can be more difficult to judge.
Acculaser

Displays the fork height for the operator and gives an indicator showing if the forks are level or tilted up. Allows the operator to quickly lift to known rack heights, eliminating much of the "creep" that an operator does when getting near the appropriate height. The tilt indicator lets the operator know if the forks are level at tall heights when that is hard to visually determine.
Height and Tilt Indicator

Allows up to 2 height limits to be preset in the programming. At these heights, the mast will stop lifting and a message will display on the screen. To continue lifting, the operator can press and release the "up" arrow button and lift. Helpful in locations that have a low ceiling height or low obstacles, but have an area with a rack position above the obstacle or with a different ceiling height.
Mast Lift Limit Switch with Bypass
Provides an amber (9848) or red (9849) strobe light mounted to the top of the overhead guard.
Warning Strobe Light (Top-Mounted)

For compatibility conditions and restrictions, please contact your Toyota forklift dealer or reference the forklift manual. Options may vary from illustrations provided. Details of specifications and equipment may change without notice.

general.description: Overview The Toyota Order Picker solves even the most challenging high-reaching warehouse needs. With lift heights up to 390 inches and cushioned mast staging, it helps operators comfortably reach your tallest racks for order picking. The Toyota Order Picker easily maneuvers narrow aisles in warehouses with minimized rack impact during case picking thanks to optional wire guidance and double rail guidance systems. You'll also drive to optimal efficiency with optional Lift Logic technology that continuously monitors lift height, allowing for optimized travel speed at various lift heights while still maintaining safe operation. Request a Brochure Toyota Material Handling | Products: Order Picker

features: 360-Degrees of Quality, Durability, and Overall Value
AC Drive and Lift Motors on most models
Automatic Return to Center Drive Tire at Startup
No Tools, High-Impact Service Access Covers

More order picker owners are seeking equipment that will help them keep lifting into the future. Toyota offers some of the top-manufactured equipment on the market, and the Toyota Order Picker is just one of many warehousing products that help keep your business moving. To keep this and all of your other Toyota manufactured equipment running long into the future, consider a Planned Maintenance (PM) plan with Toyota 360 Support. This program is our promise that we'll be your partner for the full lifetime of your forklift and beyond. Toyota Technicians will use Toyota Genuine Parts to keep your rig lifting and moving.

The Toyota Order Picker solves even the most challenging high-reaching warehouse needs. With lift heights up to 390 inches and cushioned mast staging, it helps operators comfortably reach your tallest racks for order picking. The Toyota Order Picker easily maneuvers narrow aisles in warehouses with minimized rack impact during case picking thanks to optional wire guidance and double rail guidance systems. You'll also drive to optimal efficiency with optional Lift Logic technology that continuously monitors lift height, allowing for optimized travel speed at various lift heights while still maintaining safe operation.

Toyota's Lift Logic continuously monitors speed and lift height, allowing for optimized travel speed. This helps operators increase productivity. Lift Logic boosts efficiency well beyond conventional lift/lowering speed monitoring systems.

general.description: Overview The Toyota Order Picker solves even the most challenging high-reaching warehouse needs. With lift heights up to 390 inches and cushioned mast staging, it helps operators comfortably reach your tallest racks for order picking. The Toyota Order Picker easily maneuvers narrow aisles in warehouses with minimized rack impact during case picking thanks to optional wire guidance and double rail guidance systems. You'll also drive to optimal efficiency with optional Lift Logic technology that continuously monitors lift height, allowing for optimized travel speed at various lift heights while still maintaining safe operation. Request a Brochure Toyota Material Handling | Products: Order Picker

general.description: Overview The High-Capacity IC Cushion Forklift is a homerun when it comes to versatility in the warehouse or manufacturing facility. Need to lift large pallets full of heavy components? The High-Capacity Cushion has you covered with its ability to lift up to 22,000 lbs you'll have those pallets of metal moving in no time. Have a paper plant with larger than normal rolls? The High-Capacity Cushion can come with a roll clamp to make those operations a cinch. Request A Brochure Toyota Material Handling | Products: THD Cushion Tire Forklifts

features: 360 Degrees of Quality, Durability, Reliability, & Value
Sealed Enclosure with Wires and Components
Low Chassis Side Plate for Drive Train Access

According to recent studies by Peerless Research Group, more and more forklift owners plan to keep their forklifts for 10+ years! Just like a car, truck or other motorized asset, periodic maintenance, service and upkeep is required, even under normal operating conditions, to keep your Toyota Cushion Forklift operating to peak performance. It is not uncommon for Toyota owners to use their forklift up to 10 years, as long as the forklift is properly maintained. Paired with a Planned Maintenance (PM) Plan, the Toyota Cushion Forklift can be an asset for your company for years to come.

general.description: Overview They said all the heavy lifting was happening outside. But Toyota knows that sometimes hauling high capacity loads is an inside job. The Toyota High-Capacity Large IC Cushion Forklift is an indoor mammoth of a machine. Ideal for automotive environments and moving steel inside manufacturing facilities, it gives you the ability to lift up to 100,000 lbs of the meanest metal around. And with one of the leading engines in its class, the Toyota High-Capacity Large Cushion Forklift is as dependable as it is strong. Request a Brochure Toyota Material Handling | Products: THD Cushion Tire Forklifts

general.description: Overview The Toyota High-Capacity Forklift with Adjustable Wheelbase is a master of flexibility. This sit down counterbalanced forklift allows operators to make adjustments to varying load weights with an extendable counterweight that includes removable slabs. Need to move a big, awkward item? The multi-stage telescopic boom is able to safely and efficiently move large equipment such as industrial machinery or massive engines. general.description: Overview Toyota's High-Capacity Core IC Pneumatic delivers the power and versatility you need to meet heavy-duty material handling challenges in any high-capacity operation. With standard load capacity up to 30,000 pounds, it's ideal for lumber, steel, and automotive applications and can help you move almost anything. Top it off with the durability of a rugged drive axel and Dana transmission, and you're ready to get the job done. Request a Quote Toyota Material Handling | Products: High-Capacity Core IC Pneumatic (2THD)

features: Low-Mounted Tilt Cylinders for Enhanced Visibility
Superior Torque from Cummins 4-Cylinder Diesel Engine
Advanced Hydraulic System with Built-In Pressure Monitoring
Premium Cabin with Standard Heat, A/C, and Hydraulic Controls

More forklift owners are seeking out equipment that will help them keep lifting for years in the future. Toyota offers the highest-quality equipment on the market, and the High-Capacity Core IC Pneumatic forklift can get the job done in any heavy application. The Toyota 360 Support promise is our guarantee to be your material handling partner, from the moment you purchase a Toyota. With Planned Maintenance (PM) plans, trained Toyota technicians, and top-of-the-line Toyota Genuine Parts, we'll help you keep your rig lifting and moving for years to come.

Toyota's High-Capacity Core IC Pneumatic delivers the power and versatility you need to meet heavy-duty material handling challenges in any high-capacity operation. With standard load capacity up to 30,000 pounds, it's ideal for lumber, steel, and automotive applications and can help you move almost anything. Top it off with the durability of a rugged drive axel and Dana transmission, and you're ready to get the job done.

The innovative MD4 display from Toyota comes standard on the Toyota High-Capacity Core IC Pneumatic and offers you real-time performance and diagnostic insight. This includes live fuse box and pressure readings that operators can monitor right from the cabin. Additional operator and equipment protection features help make sure this heavy-duty forklift can run with top-notch performance.

features: A Clear Illustration of Quality, Durability, Reliability, and Value
Load sensing hydraulic system for optimal performance
Hydraulic Multi-Gauge for convenient fluid checks
Brakes serviceable without removing entire drive axle
Easy seal replacement on chrome-plated rod cylinders

More forklift owners are seeking out equipment that will help them keep lifting for years in the future. Toyota offers some of the top-manufactured equipment on the market, and the High-Capacity Electric Cushion forklift is one of our most dependable heavy application models. To keep this and all of your other Toyota manufactured equipment running long into the future, consider a Planned Maintenance (PM) plan, where trained Toyota technicians will use only Toyota Genuine Parts to keep your rig lifting and moving.

With a container lifting capacity of up to 90,000 lbs and the ability to stack up to 6 high, this exceptionally stable container handler can be used in the most rugged applications. Popular in ports, terminals and shipping yards, the Toyota Loaded Container Handler will provide fast lifting cycles, high stacking and reduced freight costs. Request a Brochure

features: Your Trusted Material Handling Solutions Provider

With Toyota, you gain more than just an automation partner. You gain a full-line material handling solutions provider capable of providing all of your material handling needs. Everything from conveyors to AS/RS systems, from hand pallet jacks to container handlers, can be set up and serviced by your local Toyota forklift dealer.

We're also here to support you throughout your entire optimization journey - it's part of the Toyota 360 Support promise. Toyota dealers leverage our industry-leading product portfolio and Toyota Lean Management principles to provide you with the right solution at the right time.
You deserve a partner and solutions you can trust. Contact your local Toyota dealer today for a free site evaluation and start your automation journey today.

Built on a base of the reliable Toyota Center-Controlled Rider Pallet Jack, the innovative Toyota Center-Controlled Rider Automated Forklift uses advanced technology in environmental detection to automate repetitive tasks in your warehouse. Utilizing advanced sensors for cutting-edge, mapped-object detection, it merges the legendary dependability of Toyota warehouse equipment with the latest in automation advancement - to lower your costs and streamline your operation.

Toyota Automated Forklifts are powered by LIDAR-based natural features navigation and can operate with accuracy tolerance ranges within half an inch when positioning and delivering loads. The upshot for you? There's no need to rearrange your facility infrastructure or undergo complicated set up. We create a map of the area in which the Toyota Center-Controlled Rider Automated Forklift will work, and let the equipment do the rest.
Free Up Personnel to Perform Non-Repetitive Tasks

general.description: SCISSOR LIFT SIZES FOR ALL YOUR TALL TASKS The five models of the AICHI E-Series Scissor Lift offer working heights of 25, 26, 32, and 38 feet. Working height is calculated by adding six feet to platform extended height. The versatile offerings can be maneuvered through your facilities to reach up and across obstacles. Contact your AICHI dealer for more information. Buy Now Toyota Material Handling | Aichi Scissor Lifts

features: Fold Down Guard Rails (Optional on SV1932 Model)
Dual Operational Modes Provide Increased Platform Capacity at Lower Lift Heights (SV2632 and SV3246 Models Only)

The AICHI E-Series Scissor Lift offers carefully engineered safety features. From its anti-rollback function to speed reduction with an elevated platform, AICHI will help reduce risk for operators. A pothole protection system can help stabilize the operator's working platform. Have pedestrians around your scissor lift? These machines are equipped with a travel alarm, horn, and excellent visibility to help ensure the safety of everyone in the working environment.
SCISSOR LIFT SIZES FOR ALL YOUR TALL TASKS
